Corwin studys lead author associate professor nursing Ohio State University But women fatigue steadily fades within first two weeks giving birth What unusual  detrimental  fatigue persists researchers title: Healthy vegetarian diet reduces type 2 diabetes risk substantially
article: It common knowledge eating fruits vegetables essential maintain healthy body It also becoming clear research mounts diet featuring fewer animal products also healthier option For instance study published 2013 followed almost 70000 people concluded vegetarian diet lowered risk cancer Similarly study published Nutrition Metabolism Cardiovascular Diseases year followed 15000 individuals found vegetarian diet lessened risk diabetes As final example metaanalysis 250 studies published JAMA Internal Medicine 2014 demonstrated vegetarian diet significantly reduces blood pressure The latest study vein looked effect vegetarian diet diabetes However study also looked quality vegetarian diet They took account whether vegetarian diet high nutritious plantbased foods whole grains fresh fruits vegetables contrasted less healthy vegetarian diets included items like refined grains potatoes sweetened beverages The team headed Ambika Satija also collated information amount animalbased foods participants consumed In all study used data 20000 male female health professionals across United States 20year period The participants filled regular questionnaires covering diet medical history current diagnoses lifestyle To evaluate individuals diet team used plantbased diet index animalderived foods given low scores whereas plantderived foods received higher scores The team found diet low animal products high plant products reduced risk type 2 diabetes 20 percent When researchers split plantbased diets healthier unhealthier versions found impacted heavily risk type 2 diabetes Healthy plantbased diets produced 34 percent reduced risk type 2 diabetes less healthy plantbased diets linked 16 percent increased risk condition This implies abstaining animal products sufficient stave type 2 diabetes Simply skipping unhealthier items enough important make sure healthier plantbased food items included diet A shift dietary pattern higher healthful plantbased foods vegetables fruits whole grains legumes nuts seeds lower animalbased foods especially red processed meats confer substantial health benefits reducing risk type 2 diabetesSenior author Frank Hu Harvard TH Chan School Public Health The team found relatively modest drop consumption animalbased products five six servings four servings per day reduced type 2 diabetes incidence A diet high plantbased foods thought reduce type 2 diabetes risk thanks high levels antioxidants fiber micronutrients  magnesium  unsaturated fatty acids The lower levels saturated fats plantbased foods might also play role Additionally authors theorize vegetarian diet positive influence guts microbiome could also help reduce type 2 diabetes Although study used large sample participants limitations The main issue use selfreported dietary behavior However data taken cumulatively number years potential error minimized The researchers conclude that previously demonstrated diet lower quantities animal products healthier one higher levels But also show quality diet plays important role Learn vegetarian diet could lower blood pressure

The Kids Like Rock This exactly startling finding researchers found collegeage students overwhelmingly prefer listen rock music whether hard heavy modern includes music majors If listing hard rock nonmusic majors preferred country soft rock The music majors opted classical jazz rock The researchers bit surprised find nonmusic majors listened music music majors The nonmusic majors listened title: Can we blame delicious food for our holiday weight gain?
article: Most us heard saying if tastes good must bad you Although commonly held old adage may contain much truth all A team researchers led Dr Michael Tordoff physiological psychologist Monell Chemical Senses Center Pennsylvania set test belief detail Most people think goodtasting food causes obesity explains Tordoff unconvinced therefore designed range experiments see whether theory held water His findings recently published journal Physiology  Behavior It established feed mouse cookies chips cream become obese But flavor foods cause overeating Or could nutrient density promotes gorging After all animals evolved seek fatty sugary foods matter survival Previous studies drawn conclusions good taste in context meaning flavor texture effect weight gain flawed For instance many take account impact variety feeding behavior spread different foods choose cause one overindulge A buffet prime example this According authors recent research three studies date looked specifically influence flavor weight gain None studies conclusive however The reasons include sample size and again effects variety The first phase Tordoffs study involved establishing whether mice would prefer food added oily sweet ingredients nonnutritive The mice served two pots chow  one standard one either sucralose sweetener mineral oil both calorie free As expected mice preferred mineral oil chow sucralose chow They virtually ignored plainer fare In fact mice thought little standard chow that according study authors often defecated cup containing plain diet The second phase trial involved splitting mice three groups fed different diet 6 weeks plain chow chow mineral oil chow sucralose At end 6week period mice measured There significant differences weight fat content three experimental groups In words even tasty foods encourage overeating Even though gave mice delicious diets prolonged period gain excess weight People say if food goodtasting must bad you findings suggest case It possible create foods healthy goodtastingDr Michael Tordoff After 6week diet mice still found preferentially eat tastier chow offered standard chow demonstrating tired enhanced food In third arm taste influence amount food eaten In fact sucralose slightly reduced weight gain fat stores The conclusion drawn goodtasting food alone influence obesity Flavor determines choose eat much eat longer term Learn food preferences altered specific brain pathways

title: Chronic kidney disease may cause diabetes
article: A team University Montreal Hospital Research Centre CRCHUM discovered novel link chronic kidney disease diabetes When kidneys fail urea builds blood cause diabetes concludes study published today Journal Clinical Investigation We identified molecular mechanisms may responsible increased blood glucose levels patients nondiabetic chronic kidney disease Our observations mice human samples show disease cause secondary diabetes said Dr Vincent Poitout researcher CRCHUM Director principal investigator study Chronic kidney disease characterized progressive irreversible loss kidney function filtering eliminating toxins blood Eventually affected must undergo dialysis kidney transplantation eliminate toxins bloodstream It well known type 2 diabetes one causes chronic kidney disease The nephrologist Laetitia Koppe completed postdoctoral fellow Dr Poitouts laboratory proven opposite also true About half affected chronic kidney disease abnormal blood sugar levels I wondered why We conducted experiments mice found impaired insulin secretion pancreatic beta cells observed diabetes We observed abnormalities samples pancreatic cells patients chronic kidney disease explained Dr Koppe The researchers highlighted surprisingly toxic role urea nitrogenous waste product normally filtered kidneys excreted urine In patients chronic renal failure kidneys longer able eliminate toxins Urea part cocktail waste accumulates blood In nephrology textbooks urea presented harmless product This study demonstrates opposite urea directly responsible impaired insulin secretion chronic kidney disease argued Koppe At heart pancreatic beta cells Drs Koppe Poitout identified particular protein called phosphofruktokinase 1 The function protein altered increase blood urea occurs chronic kidney disease Increased urea causes impaired insulin secretion pancreatic beta cells This creates oxidative stress excessive glycosylation phosphofructokinase 1 causes imbalance blood glucose may progress diabetes said Dr Poitout also professor University Montreal Canada Research Chair Diabetes Pancreatic BetaCell Function The study important reveals link rather novel mechanism chronic kidney disease diabetes Further studies required validate findings humans But observations confirmed mean patients nondiabetic chronic kidney disease risk developing diabetes One might suggest therapeutic approaches taking antioxidants may protect pancreatic beta cells reduce risk developing diabetes said Dr Poitout

title: Could a Mediterranean diet protect against ADHD?
article: Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder ADHD neurodevelopmental condition characterized poor attention impulsive behavior hyperactivity According Centers Disease Control Prevention CDC 2011 approximately 11 percent children aged 4 17 United States received diagnosis ADHD making one common neurodevelopmental disorders childhood Although precise causes ADHD unclear previous research suggested poor diet may play role Some studies also indicated healthful diets could help prevent treat ADHD though research challenged theory For new study team leader Mara Izquierdo Pulido Faculty Pharmacy Food Sciences University Barcelona Spain colleagues investigated whether Mediterranean diet might associated lower ADHD diagnosis To knowledge studies examined potential relationship adherence Mediterranean diet ADHD authors note The Mediterranean diet typically high fruits vegetables fish whole grains nuts legumes low red meats eggs dairy products sweets A Mediterranean diet considered many optimal diet good health studies linking eating pattern reduced risk heart disease Alzheimers disease types cancer To determine whether diet may effective ADHD Pulido team analyzed data 60 children adolescents aged 6 16 diagnosed ADHD These children matched age sex 60 children without ADHD The dietary patterns two groups assessed using food frequency questionnaires team used KIDMED test calculate childrens adherence Mediterranean diet Compared children high adherence Mediterranean diet low adherence likely received diagnosis ADHD researchers report Furthermore team identified higher prevalence ADHD among children consumed high amounts candy sugary drinks low amounts fatty fish While researchers say study cannot conclude Mediterranean diet protects ADHD say findings indicate poor dietary patterns may linked disorder The authors conclude The current findings suggest certain dietary habits may play role ADHD development even though work required investigate causality determine dietary manipulation could reverse symptoms ADHD taking consideration potential factors Therefore main recommendation clinicians focus diet expectation dietary changes improving behavior concern children ADHD likely eating unhealthy diets component therefore part evaluation improve health Learn study suggests ADHD may overdiagnosed younger children

title: Daily supplement of folic acid recommended to prevent birth defects
article: The Centers Disease Control Prevention CDC report birth defects affect approximately 3 percent babies born year United States leading cause death among infants Neural tube defects NTDs major 20032006 National Health Nutrition Examination Survey showed around 75 percent women aged 1544 receive daily intake necessary preventing NTDs The USPSTF conclude net benefits taking folic acid concludes with high certainty benefits recommended daily supplemental intake substantial Learn folic acid may prevent congenital heart defects
